column6: p.r.; Obs G(As$^{\text{V}}$) and G(H$_2$O$_2$); data fitting assuming $k$(H + As$^{\text{IV}}$) = $7 \times 10^{8}$; 0.4 mol L$^{-1}$ H$_2$SO$_4$.

column7: C.k.; in soln. contg. $5 \times 10^{-5}$ mol L$^{-1}$ Fe$^{2+}$, $2.5 \times 10^{-4}$ mol L$^{-1}$ H$_2$O$_2$, HClO$_4$, and added Fe$^{3+}$ which oxidizes the As(IV) formed; rel. to $k$(.OH + Fe$^{2+}$).
